analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/23/0x37d82a4e03e93529c1a32429984e12e7875ea1d8.sol:
	Contract OMGCatCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/23/0x37d82a4e03e93529c1a32429984e12e7875ea1d8.sol#197)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/23/0x37d82a4e03e93529c1a32429984e12e7875ea1d8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/23/0x37d82a4e03e93529c1a32429984e12e7875ea1d8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/23/0x37d82a4e03e93529c1a32429984e12e7875ea1d8.sol#80) is not in mixedCase
